docs.snippet: A public hearing on an application by the Grace Line for an operating subsidy for its New York-Caribbean service was ordered yesterday by the Federal Maritime Board. The date has not yet been set.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, March. 9 President and Senora Peron closed the first Pan-American Games under brilliant floodlights in the River Plate Stadium tonight. The occasion was more ceremonial than competitive but in the final event, Chile won the Cup of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, March. 9 President and Senora Peron closed the first Pan-American Games under brilliant floodlights in the River Plate Stadium tonight. The occasion was more ceremonial than competitive but in the final event, Chile won the Cup of the Nations for equestrian jumping and a Chilean captain gained top individual honors.
docs.abstract: Chile equestrian team Cup of Nations; games end; Argentina unofficial winner, US 2d

docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay. THE first international film  festival held in the Western Hemisphere became history early Tuesday morning, but  already Uruguayans are talking of another one next year.
